title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-switcher
author: Mario Pietsch
name: Palette Switcher
readme:
!! Important This plugin "Palette Switcher" replaces the ''ControlPanel -> Appearence -> Palette'' tab There is a new page-control buttion in the ''right sidebar'': {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-switcher/ui/images/moon|2em}}, which allows you to fast switch between 2 predefined palettes. This plugin modifies a core module and / or templates
    <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-switcher]plugintiddlers[]prefix[$:/core/]]">
  • <$link to=<>><>
